hero.subtitle: The best stories often start with a problem — ours is no exception.

start.heading: It all started in 2020.
start.p1: Our founder was tired of generic solutions that didn’t meet each customer’s specific needs. It was time to build something different.
start.p2: The thinking was simple: if one product can’t satisfy everyone, let’s create a tailored approach for every need.
start.p3: With more determination than hours of sleep, we decided that if the perfect solution didn’t exist, we would invent it.

2020.title: The idea is born
2020.text: 15 months of research, testing, and dozens of prototypes to craft the right solution.

2022.title: First milestones
2022.text: International recognition and innovation awards. Our solution becomes a benchmark.

2024.title: European expansion
2024.text: We arrive in France with a local team determined to reinvent the customer experience.
